content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipėda district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the applicant was awarded a toyota avensis car as their personal property but they must also pay the defendant a compensation of 3100 the court ruled that the applicant is responsible for fulfilling the obligations of the marriage and the defendant must compensate the applicant for fulfilling these obligations the court referred to various articles from the civil code related to the division of assets in a marriage the court also annulled the marriage and determined that the minor child will reside with the applicant the defendant was ordered to pay a fine for the child the property acquired during the marriage was divided with the defendant receiving a land plot and two cars and the applicant receiving one car the court established that the liability of the marriage creditors will remain joint and the applicant will be responsible for discharging the obligation with their personal funds the court allowed the applicant to retain their married name the court also addressed access arrangements for the child the court upheld the counterclaim made by the defendant and annulled the entry in the marriage register the court divided the matrimonial property between the applicant and the defendant the applicant was awarded a passenger car while the defendant was awarded a plot of land and a toyota avensis car the court ordered the applicant to pay the defendant compensation of €3100 the court also declared that the applicant has an obligation to the bank and established a settlement procedure for the applicant to pay instalments to the bank the defendant was ordered to pay the costs of the proceedings the applicant was provided with secondary legal aid by the state the defendant was ordered to pay a stamp duty to the state the defendant was also ordered to pay the costs of the proceedings for another defendant

metadata.cost: 1'053.03 EUR (legal+ court fees) + 293.55 EUR (stamp duty)by the defendant
